storyInfo: The warship carrying the Stone of the Sword – the Gloriana – is besieged by the Sarkaz. To preserve the glimmer of victory, Siege, assisted by her companions, charges towards the Gloriana with Realmblade in hand.

attributes.content: All hands, you are not to change your route without authorization. Pass through the Gastrell's covering bombardment area posthaste.
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: Cover the General's return to the ship!
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: Shells rain down on both sides of the mobile force that is moving at full speed. Smoke obscures their whereabouts, and withering artillery fire crushes the Sarkaz troops collapsing upon them.
Wait, two hundred meters ahead – I found something strange belonging to those Nachzehrers!
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: The aura emanating from that throne... seems to be letting those damn devils to replenish their ranks faster.
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: They're closing in fast... They're trying to intercept us!
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: General, do we need the flank guard to continue the diversion–
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Commander, we're––
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: Run them over. *cough*...
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: (Labored gasps)
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Amidst the smoke, silent figures in white robes raise their longswords, sundering the artillery fire falling upon them.
They disappear into the plumes of smoke and dust kicked up by the explosions.
Prepare to intercept the enemy. Five, four, three, two––
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: Don't disappoint me––
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: One!
attributes.name: Redsteel Guard Member

attributes.content: The skies... are raining fire––
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Not all death is alike, Sarkaz.
Purple flames wreathe the Duke of Wellington's entire mobile unit, and a rising pillar of flames carves out a completely safe domain on the battlefield—
A sanctuary brought by the flames of death.
You've more than proven your trustworthiness, Lady Eblana.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: And I, too, admire your duel against death.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: However, your injuries are still severe, and the Nachzehrer's deathly aura still eats away at your body.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Your uniform may hide your injuries, but not from me.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Take my hand, Your Grace. You should not be riding these rickety vehicles.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Allow me to personally escort you back to the Gastrell.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: It's just a flesh wound.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: The Duke who overcame death ignores the Draco's outstretched hand, his body remaining upright with the help of his cane.
Pain?
Little more than that.
Lady Eblana, your flames still burn a bit too hot.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Make an opening in this wall of flame, and I will lead the way.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Don't worry. This cane has accompanied me through more dreadful battlefields.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: I will stand atop the Gastrell's bow and await Victoria's call for help.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: As you wish, my ever-faithful lord.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: If your body can no longer sustain your ambition, then I shall rekindle your heart with flames.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Even death shall be no obstacle for your march forward.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: We are Tara. We shall stand upon the most glorious place in this land––
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Together, we shall set this battlefield alight.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: 'Warning, warning––'
'Damage to the hull is in excess of sixty-five percent. Navigation system offline. Propulsion system offline...'
'Activate backup power supply.'
'The engine room has been damaged, and there's a serious leakage of Originium fuel.'
'At 2:34, the Frederick was struck by three witchcraft shells simultaneously, paralyzing its propulsion system.'
'The combat zone is heavily contaminated by witchcraft. The three supporting frigates are unable to approach, and currently dispatching infantry––'

'The second defensive line has incurred a fierce assault! The 9th Battalion Armored Corps is currently holding back the Nachzehrer infantry. Lieutenant Colonel Blake and Major Mourning have been slain. Captain Seymour is currently in command.'
'The Excelsior has discovered an approaching squad of Nachzehrer casters! We've lost contact with the Intrepid, with no specific coordinates identified...'
'Duke Gododdin's three dreadnoughts are approaching full-speed to provide support. Duke Abercorn and Duke Ashworth's assault battlegroups are also responding to the call for help!'
'Originium activity is so rampant that it's off the charts! What the hell is that? Is the Originium eating our ship?!'
Your Grace, the situation is changing extremely quickly.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The surviving Trilby Ashers have already been sent out, and the news they've brought back has been compiled here.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Our men are dying out there, and the Nachzehrers are turning the entire battlefield into a meat grinder.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: *cough*... How many of us are still left?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Less than a third.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Your Grace should retreat.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Our flagship still retains its defensive capabilities. Even in this condition, it should at least be able to clear a way back for you.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: I can't leave.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Aileen, spread the word that I will be staying on the Glory. Use whatever means you have at your disposal.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: If I abandon the front line, the defensive line will inevitably be routed. Victory will be yet another step further away from Victoria.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: What would the other soldiers think of us? That yet another duke has abandoned them?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: When this battle is over, our soldiers must also remember – what price I paid for this victory.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: I will continue to draw the Nachzehrers' fire. The other dukes will surely come to my aid.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: They understand exactly what is and is not important at this current moment.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Besides, my elite forces are all here. You are all the support I need.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Nothing more needs to be said–
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Watch out, Your Grace!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hmph. We'll start by clearing out this cabin.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Our march towards victory begins from this stronghold.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Your Grace...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: *sigh* As you command. Then, we must get our hands on the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Stone of the Sword is still here, undamaged. That is our best opportunity for a counterattack.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Is the Trilby Asher who's been in contact with our lovely Vina still alive?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Our communication channels are back online now.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Excellent. Get in touch with him.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: I have new orders for him.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.text: 'The enemy line up ahead is going to be hard to handle. Are you sure you want to keep pushing forward?'
'Activating the Realmblade is the best option we have for turning the tides of this battle. We've already come this far – and this is something only we can do!'

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... The Exemplars?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Use your head, soldier. Don't charge right up to the enemy.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: So much blood... Oripathy. And the suppressants... Damn it, we ran out a while ago.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Hang in there a bit longer, and don't move. There's a chance the Originium crystals puncture your lungs.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: It doesn't matter anymore.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Doctor... Sir, just about all our men are dead.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Clark was the second to last one. See that hand over there by your feet? That's all that's left of him.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What can I do?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: ...Your name.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Patel. Richard Patel.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Private Patel, from your badge, I see you were assigned to the 9th Battalion Armored Corps and your commanding officer is Lieutenant Colonel Blake.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, your company's mission is to protect Duke Caster's flagship.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Who are you? Which unit are you from?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Delphine. From the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I'm just like you... I despise those enemies. They took everything from me.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But, I still remember my mission. I'm here to aid you, Private Patel.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Aid me?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Duke Windermere is dead. I don't know if our esteemed duke is still with us.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: And then, there's the Iron Duke... That bloody codger, Wellington! He deserted the battlefield!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What are you people even doing here? What hope do we have for victory?!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Delphine subconsciously glances over at Vina, who stands not far away with the Sighs of Kings strapped to her back.
...Even if the Grand Dukes give up, we will not.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Is that so...?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: He's... not going to last much longer.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Shit, hurry up and spread out! He could implode at any moment – we won't have time to deal with him!
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Delphine sees the soldier's bloodshot eyes... There's determination and desire burning within them.
Listen up, Exemplars. There's a contingent of Nachzehrers up ahead.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Put me... into that tank over there.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Wait, Delphine! Don't go near him, I can handle this––
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Allow me to help you, Private Patel.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: ...If this is your last wish.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: The battered tank hurtles towards the Sarkaz troops.
Many of the Exemplars had no idea what was going on, until they heard... the one last battle cry an ordinary soldier gave using his life.
We will record all you've accomplished here today.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Each and every member of the Duke of Caster's 9th Battalion Armored Corps was a good soldier, ready to defend the Gloriana and Victoria herself with their lives.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Wait, what's going on? The dead are standing up?
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: No, no... It's not the dead that are standing. They're...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Withered branches.
Twigs sprout from the fallen bodies of the Nachzehrer warriors, extending in every direction, burrowing back towards the fog where the scent of rot and decay is strongest.
A figure rises from the fog and quickly approaches.
Get back, Delphine!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Dull growl)
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Urgh... Luckily, it'll take more than that to kill me off.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If we die here, our lives will get sucked up by the Nachzehrer altars, and we'll turn into their food.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Does that mean... Private Patel's last wish was in vain? If these enemies cannot even be defeated by death...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No, Delphine. He was able to slay this squad of Nachzehrers.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: However––
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: That monster's clearly weakened, and trying to feed off death. Take advantage of this opportunity and destroy the target!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll cover you! Bagpipe, mark my flank!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Private Patel's wish will not be in vain. We'll charge out through the opening he created.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Everyone, move it!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Don't hesitate. Slow down for a second, and the whole situation might spiral out of control.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What are you still standing there for?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You... Don't tell me, you're choosing now of all times to get cold feet?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Getting cold feet? No, I just need to stay behind for the time being to fulfill my duty.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Your Highness, Alexandrina, please don't glare at me like that. I really do have urgent business to attend to.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Duke has just given me her latest orders––
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The deal is off. You are to evacuate with the Sighs of Kings, and await her further instructions.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You will not be able to reach the Stone of the Sword, and this 'key' must not fall into Sarkaz hands.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If necessary, 'special measures' can be employed to ensure the safety of the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: How did I see this coming.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There's no need to be so wary of me. I have been completely forthcoming when it comes to the Duke's orders.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I know you're loathe to abandon your quest for the Stone of the Sword, but...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Count me in.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: My highest priority remains to ensure the safety of the Duke.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: *sigh* But at a time like this, where am I supposed to find allies more trustworthy than the Exemplars?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Your duke's not going to be happy with your decision.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Would you look at that, we've already switched sides.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Look at it this way – I'm outnumbered here, and I don't have any way of dealing with all of you.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Go, Your Royal Highness. I hope your plan is a complete one.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Don't worry. My dear aunt won't have anything to worry about... I know what I have to do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina's plans are never complicated, and that has proven surprisingly effective on this chaotic battlefield.
Everyone in the Exemplars knows exactly what they're fighting for.
Now matter how the war forces them apart, in the end, those who survive will gather to lift the glass of victory.

attributes.text: 'The plan is straightforward – Delphine, you're in charge of commanding from the periphery and pinning down the Sarkaz laying siege to the Gloriana.'
'Chip away at them, and avoid direct engagements.'

attributes.content: Can you still walk?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I... don't think so...
attributes.name: Exemplar Soldier

attributes.content: Then, grab onto my back.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I've moved you to safety... Well, there's nowhere's that's safe anymore.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But let's get behind that piece of the destroyed warship. Hide behind there for the time being.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Don't worry about us... Right now, urgh... the Sighs of Kings takes the highest priority!
attributes.name: Exemplar Soldier

attributes.content: Don't be daft.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Vina's team knows what to do with the Sighs of Kings. Our mission right now is to contain the enemy and siphon off some of their firepower.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Lieutenant, I need medical assistance over here!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Fitz, where are you from?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Eastham... *cough*––
attributes.name: Exemplar Soldier

attributes.content: I've been there before. They've got good leather.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: There's an open wound on the leg with visible puncturing. Stop the bleeding first. Do you have pain anywhere else other than the wound?
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: No, I'm just... a bit tired, that's all...
attributes.name: Exemplar Soldier

attributes.content: Do you have anyone on your mind right now, Fitz?!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Barry... from across the street. He still owes me–
attributes.name: Exemplar Soldier

attributes.content: Don't say it. Just keep repeating it in your heart. Just repeat it to yourself over and over!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Then, go back home alive and tell him yourself!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The patient is conscious and has no fractures, internal bleeding, or acute infection.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Alright, the wound has been cleaned. I will now bandage it and apply anti-inflammatories. He should be fine with some rest.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: You did well, Delphine.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Lieutenant, do you ever think about wanting to rewind time to the day our ship was raided?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If we can win, sure.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: I'm of the same mind.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Because of my mistakes, my incompetence... we were miserably defeated by the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I don't want that to happen again today.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Lieutenant, please take Fitz back. I'm still needed here.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.text: 'Travel lightly, quickly break through the encirclement, and go for the pedestal. Horn, Bagpipe, we're counting on you to cover our flank!'
'You heard that, Hannah, Morgan, Dagda? We're gonna charge forward and never look back!'
'Sounds like we're rushing straight into a fight for our lives! I'm getting excited already!'

attributes.content: This bunker's not gonna hold!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Where's the location of the next bunker?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Strange Man in the Hat's already found it for us. Keep your eyes peeled for his signal!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Those soldiers up there are Caster's guards! We're almost there!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The bombardment is thinning out! Delphine's forces have managed to draw away a large chunk of their firepower!
attributes.name: Dagda
Siege
attributes.content: I can see the pedestal clearly now–

attributes.name: Siege
attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.joined: I can see the pedestal clearly now–Get down!

attributes.content: Hold on! That attack just now wasn't from the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain, it's the Gloriana!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Gloriana has noticed us.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Its guns are clearing the way for us!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Pounce on to it! Press onward!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They continue to charge into the tempest, to where the artillery fire converges, to where their enemies are.
Hammer smashes into bone, and sword cleaves through flesh.
Those standing shoulder-to-shoulder are getting heavier injuries, yet they no longer bother to wipe the blood from their faces.
They continue pressing forward. No matter how perilous, they never stop.
The Gloriana is right there in front of them, and Vina can already hear the roar of battle coming from above.
Hold out a bit longer. We're about to break through–
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: '(Indistinct Sarkaz language) You shall...'
'(Indistinct Sarkaz language) ...not pass.'

attributes.text: I've lost all sensation... in the arm holding my hammer...

attributes.content: 'Vina!'
'The Sighs of Kings! The Sighs of Kings has been knocked flying! After it––'

attributes.text: The Sigh... of Kings? That's... the sword? But I... had it on my back...

attributes.content: '(Indistinct Sarkaz language) Death...'
'(Indistinct Sarkaz language) ...the final end'
'Damnit! Vina, stand up!'
'Help her! Bagpipe, cover my back! I need to reload!'
'I can block their blades! Bloody hell, why can't I run any faster?!'

attributes.text: A dark shadow... Something... is approaching me...

attributes.content: 'Vina!!!'
'Victoria...'
'Victoria!'
'Victoria!!'
Vina could never forget that voice, even if she can on longer make out all the information it contains.
But, her intuition tells her... that it is a name. A name that is associated with her entire life.
The ground shatters, and along with it, three mobile altars.
White vapor erupts, and a fiery red blade emerges.
Look – a Steam Knight!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: A Steam Knight stands with us!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Victoria's glory has returned, and he stands with us!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Follow him into battle!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Slay them! Slay every last Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: 'Glooooory–– to Victoria!!!'
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: (Muffled gushing sound)
attributes.name: Charles Lynch

attributes.content: Slash. Pierce. Charge.
The suit of armor fights valiantly, and ferociously.
The path behind him is soon littered with Sarkaz corpses and the fragments of shattered altars.
Witchcraft missiles fall at his feet, crossbow bolts fly towards him, blades slash at his body.
But, he never stops. He cleaves apart the next enemy, sweeping them away, along with any traces they left on him.
A Steam Knight... still lives?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That's right. We saw him inside the city.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But why... is he here now?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: He came... for the sword...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina!
attributes.name: Indra
Siege
attributes.content: I... can still fight!

attributes.name: Siege
attributes.content: But... the sword is gone!
attributes.joined: I... can still fight!But... the sword is gone!

attributes.content: I see the Sighs of Kings! It's lying atop of a pile of bodies in the combat zone. I'll retrieve it for you.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Just as you said – pounce on to it, and press onward. Don't look back.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I promise you that the sword will appear when it is needed.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Vina...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I will keep going. Cover me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: She clenches the hammer in her hands, shrugging off all doubt and hesitation.
She has placed her trust not just in her partners, but also in people who she had never trusted before... No, she placed her trust in all of Victoria.
The Victoria she believes in.
Run. Faster. Almost there...
Argh—!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Don't force it!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Get hit again, and you're a goner!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The mobile altar...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ––It stopped?!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Then, who fired that shot...? One of our own tanks?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Vina, we're connected with the Duke of Fife's suit of armor! We've also located Captain Seymour – he's still alive! More troops are on their way to join us!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We'll handle all those altar that are flying around!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Great news! Let's keep moving!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Don't you dare get in our way!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've used up the last of our ammunition. That means... it'll come down to some good old CQC.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Roger that, Captain!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Pretty nostalgic, right? Reminds me of our academy days.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let's see how these Sarkaz like our technique.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let them try... to get past us.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Stone of the Sword is right ahead, but that corrosive fog...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Royal Highness, my colleagues have secured the Gloriana.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: *cough*... The next time our cooperation is needed, the Exemplars will hear from this Trilby once more.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Finally, allow me to use my Originium Arts... as well as a little bit of authority, to light your way.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A ray of green light cuts through the dense fog of decay.
Deep within the storm, the Stone of the Sword radiates with light.
Oh right, the sword...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: After thinking things through, one really should not disobey a duke's orders––
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But I also made a promise to Your Royal Highness. That's quite a pickle.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Alright, then. Catch!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A silver light streaks across the battlefield, piercing through the fog.
The Sighs of Kings. A blade so common that it does not attract the attention of soldiers on either side of the battlefield––
I've got it!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't turn back now, Siege! This is the final stretch!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Dun worry about me, Captain! Go with them!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The storm rises from the battlefield, but the White Wolf has already leapt up.
Aim, fire. A procedure she knows by heart.
Take it, Siege!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The longsword left her hand, cutting through the air as countless eyes followed its path.
Vina never looks back. She simply continues running, carefully listening to every last sound.
Swoosh.
The sound of metal vibrating through the air. The sound of air being cut apart by a sharp object.
She forcefully throws down the hammer in her hands. Its massive head lodges into the cliffside, creating a tiny foothold for her.
She steps on it, and leaps. And when she extends her hand, the Sighs of Kings has already found its way into her palm.
Indra, Morgan, remember how we used to chuck Molotov cocktails down the chimneys of the nobles?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yeah, we'd stand on each other's shoulders!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But this time, I'll be running ahead first.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Originium beneath her feet feel like alive, unlike any wall or mountain she's ever traversed before.
How much farther?
How much longer will it be until the dark clouds disperse, and the war draws its last breath?
She fled Londinium to the land beyond its walls; then from there, she returned. How much farther must she go... before she returns to her peaceful homeland, and to the people she loves?
Vina does not know. But at least, the Stone of the Sword is right before her eyes. She extricates her hammer with all her might.
She knows what she must do.
She leaps up, hammer and sword held high in her hands, glimmering in the sunlight.
